channel.title: Mortgage Freedom Calculator Blog
channel.description: Tips and strategies to pay off your mortgage faster, save thousands in interest, and achieve financial freedom.

item.title: Everything Costs More. Can You Still Afford a Home?
item.description: Groceries, gas, insurance, childcare — everything is more expensive. Housing is the biggest cost of all. See what Americans can actually afford in 2026, salary by salary, and learn how to calculate your real number.

item.title: Should I Rent or Buy a Home? The Real Math Nobody Shows You
item.description: The rent vs buy decision is more complex than most advice suggests. See the hidden costs on both sides, when renting wins, when buying wins, and how to run the real numbers for your situation.

item.title: Is the Starter Home Dream Dead?
item.description: The median age of first-time homebuyers has reached 40 — an all-time high. What happened to the starter home, and what does this mean for the American Dream? A personal reflection on how homeownership has changed.

item.title: Bi-Weekly vs. Lump Sum: What's the Best Way to Make Extra Mortgage Payments?
item.description: Should you sign up for bi-weekly payments, make a lump sum at the start of the year, or add extra each month? We compare all three strategies with real numbers and explain how mortgage interest calculation makes timing matter.

item.title: How Do Extra Mortgage Payments Work?
item.description: Discover how making extra payments on your mortgage can save you tens of thousands of dollars in interest and help you become debt-free years earlier. Learn the math behind why even small extra payments make a big difference.

item.title: What Age Should You Pay Off Your Mortgage?
item.description: Is there an ideal age to be mortgage-free? We explore the factors to consider when setting your payoff goal, from retirement planning to opportunity costs, and help you find the right target for your situation.

item.title: How Much Can You Save Paying Off Your Mortgage Early?
item.description: The numbers might surprise you. See real examples of how much homeowners can save by paying off their mortgage ahead of schedule, and learn which strategies provide the biggest bang for your buck.
